column5: Had to take a business trip there this week,  these mountains in the background are Asbestos slag piles,...anyone know anything about this?  I mean the pics dont do them justice,..these are huge mountains and these people living there are sourounded by them.
nice lil town I get my nic cyls from there and rebuilt cranks  from adrein bernard inc
very amazing town..i ride my snowmobile alot there in the winter..last winter they got so much snow a kid got burried in an avalanche from playing on one of them hills
Looks like a small town you would see in a movie. I like it!
We used to sell a bunch of mesh out there when the town was more active.  I have been a number of times.  Interesting spot.  Did you note any activity?
